description: Tech-agnostic workflow automation plugins for development lifecycle

phases._comment: Features grouped by infrastructure phase for build ordering

features.name: Project Detection and Initialization
features.description: Automatic tech stack detection, project.json generation, environment validation, and workflow creation from Airtable templates
features.architecture_notes: Foundation plugin provides /foundation:detect, /foundation:init-structure, /foundation:generate-workflow with stack-detector agent

features.name: Specification Management
features.description: Feature and infrastructure spec generation, similarity detection, architecture integration, roadmap synchronization
features.architecture_notes: Planning plugin provides /planning:add-feature, /planning:add-spec, /planning:spec with feature-analyzer agent

features.name: Task Layering and Parallel Execution
features.description: Transform sequential tasks into parallel-capable layers with agent assignments, complexity stratification, dependency analysis
features.architecture_notes: Iterate plugin provides /iterate:tasks with task-layering agent

features.name: Automated Implementation Execution
features.description: Phase-aware orchestration with parallel execution, automatic plugin command discovery from settings.json, SlashCommand delegation
features.architecture_notes: Implementation plugin provides /implementation:execute with execution-orchestrator and command-executor agents

features.name: Code Adjustment and Refactoring
features.description: Targeted code changes based on feedback, quality improvements without functionality changes, feature enhancements

features.name: Quality Validation
features.description: Code review against specs, security rule validation, comprehensive test recommendations, task completion verification
features.architecture_notes: Quality plugin provides /quality:validate-code, /quality:validate-tasks with code-validator and task-validator agents

features.name: Automated Testing
features.description: Newman/Postman API testing, Playwright E2E testing, frontend component testing, test suite generation
features.architecture_notes: Testing plugin provides /testing:test, /testing:generate-tests with test-generator agents and newman-testing, playwright-e2e skills

features.name: Deployment Orchestration
features.description: Platform auto-detection (FastMCP Cloud, Vercel, Railway, DigitalOcean), deployment preparation, validation, monitoring setup
features.architecture_notes: Deployment plugin provides /deployment:deploy, /deployment:prepare, /deployment:validate with deployment-detector agent
